d1: The title of the chart is Countries with the Highest Estimated Share of Worldwide New HIV Infections in 2021.
d2: The pie chart shows the estimated share of new HIV infections for each country around the world in 2021.

insight1.insightSentence: South Africa represents the largest portion, with Mozambique and Nigeria follows at 7% and 5%, respectively.

subInsights.phrases: South Africa represents the largest portion
with Mozambique and Nigeria follows at 7% and 5%, respectively

insight2.insightSentence: The rest of the world accounts for 51% of the estimated share.

subInsights.phrases: The rest of the world accounts for 51% of the estimated share
